author: Not available
source: The Complete Corpus of Anglo-Saxon Poetry

text.0: Ego dixi, Domine, miserere mei; sana animam meam, quia peccaui tibi.
text.1: Ic nu mægene cweðe:           "Miltsa me, drihten,
text.2: hæl mine sawle,           forðon me hreoweð nu
text.3: þæt ic firene on ðe           fremede geneahhige."
